snippet: After more than 11 weeks since the devastating storm, New York, New Jersey and Connecticut are still waiting on adequate federal aid.
abstract: Editorial cautions House Republicans against denying aid for victims of Hurricane Sandy; warns that it is worth remembering that disasters are not confined to one region of country, and those who vote against aid now may well find their constituents desperate for assistance in future.
lead_paragraph: After more than 11 weeks since the devastating storm, New York, New Jersey and Connecticut are still waiting on adequate federal aid.

headline.seo: Don’t Skimp on Hurricane Sandy Aid
